channel.title: Is this possible
channel.description: i was thinking that i wanted to add a admin+ room and well i was thinking i wanted to add it into one of the teleports i am using garbos source and i changed the name of the beginner training tele to Admin Room- Only admins+ are allowed and i was wondering how do i change the tele location and am i able to make the tele restricted to only admin+(so they can only use it, no one else)

item.title: Is this possible
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

yeah sorry it would be if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminroom") && playerRights >= 2) { toX = xxxx; /x coord toY = yyyy; /y coord heghtlevel = 0; /if on the bottom floor updateRequired = true /not sure about this part }

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_girls i pk girls
item.description:
@i_pk_girls wrote:

[quote=“owndscape, post:2, topic:306669”]go into the clickingmost.java idk if garbo has one but if it does just search the coords that you are teleported to in the training area and change them also if that doesn’t work you could just make a ::command that is like ::adminroom
so it would be something like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminroom")) toX = xxxx; /x coord toY = yyyy; /y coord heghtlevel = 0; /if on the bottom floor updateRequired = true /not sure about this part[/quote]
wouldn’t you need player rights = 2 or something like that in there???

Read full topic
